main.desc:
Margot Viarnés's study works in public and private spaces, both with companies and with private clients, both nationally and internationally.

Our philosophy of interior design is to create unique spaces and exclusive according to the objectives of each one of our clients. Well-being and quality are our priority.

We work with entrepreneurs and business executives, who can not worry about the project and the execution of The work until its completion. Margot Viarnés's study closes the budgets and agrees with the agreed deadlines. We work with business owners, owners of commercial premises, who seek a functional and aesthetic improvement that will help them to boost their business.

We work with clients that seek to improve their well-being through the rehabilitation or decoration of their home.

We work with foreign clients who need to renovate or decorate their new space in Spain. The Study by Margot Viarn It coordinates and delivers all finished work without the need for the client to be installed in the country. If they change residence later, the Study coordinates the dismantling and transport to the new home.

Margot Viarnés i His studio has done works outside of Spain, in cities such as London, Paris, Düsseldorf, Cologne, Brussels and Lisbon, both with their own equipment as a subcontractor.
main.title: Clients and services

main.desc:
Over 20 years creating unique spaces and designing furniture. Margot is recognized as one of the top 10 Spanish designers in furniture design, as shown in (Mujeres al Proyecto), special publication of the Ministry of Industry has been recognized internationally among the 40 designers of furniture that have marked the history of design in Europe (Nientedimeno Nothing Less, by Anty Pansera). Their chairs and sofas can be found all over the world.

The Margot Viarnés Studio has been recognized as one of the 50 most prestigious interior design and design studios in Spain, (Interiorismo Plus). In its showroom in Barcelona, ​​you can see some of its furniture designs and Also feel the character and know-how that prints as an interior designer.

Margot Viarnés's Studio has a team of professionals in architecture, engineering, industrial carpentry, computer science, electricity, painting cabinetmaker eria, sewing, assembly ..., with the same degree of commitment that Margot acquires in each project and are coordinated by it every day.
main.subtitle: Interior designer and industrial designer
main.title: Margot Viarnés
